properties.Name: ProductDirectLaborBudget
properties.Description:
The cost of labor that directly manufacture or support the associated product or service.

Direct labor costs appear on the income statement as part of "cost of goods sold" or "cost of services provided".

(See INCOME STATEMENT - Cost Of Goods Sold or Cost Of Services Delivered)

Columns.Name: ProductDirectLaborBudgetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product Direct Labor Budget.

Columns.Name: ProductDirectLaborBudgetVersionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product Direct Labor Budget Sales Version.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: OperatingBudgetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product/Service Operating Budget.

Columns.Name: OperatingBudgetVersionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Operating Budget Version.

Columns.Name: BudgetedNumberOfDirectLaborEmployeesRequired
Columns.Description: The budgeted/planned number of direct employees forecast for the period to directly support the associated product/service.

Columns.Name: BudgetedDirectLaborEmployeeFullyBurdenedLaborCostsAmount
Columns.Description: The budgeted/planned fully-burden direct labor employee costs for the period.

Columns.Name: BudgetedNumberOfDirectLaborNonEmployeesRequired
Columns.Description: The budgeted/planned number of direct non-employees forecast for the period to directly support the associated product/service.

Columns.Name: BudgetedDirectLaborNonEmployeeFullyBurdenedLaborCostsAmount
Columns.Description: The budgeted/planned fully-burden direct labor non-employee costs for the period.

Columns.Name: ActualNumberOfDirectLaborEmployeesRequired
Columns.Description: The actual number of direct employees required for the period to directly support the associated product/service.

Columns.Name: ActualNumberOfDirectLaborNonEmployeesRequired
Columns.Description: The actual number of direct non-employees required for the period to directly support the associated product/service.

Columns.Name: ActualDirectLaborFullyBurdenedEmployeeLaborCostsAmount
Columns.Description: The actual fully-burden direct labor costs for employees for the period.

Columns.Name: ActualDirectLaborNonEmployeeLaborsCostsAmount
Columns.Description: The actual fully-burden direct labor costs for non-employees for the period.

Properties.Description:
The cost of labor that directly manufacture or support the associated product or service.

Direct labor costs appear on the income statement as part of "cost of goods sold" or "cost of services provided".

(See INCOME STATEMENT - Cost Of Goods Sold or Cost Of Services Delivered)
